title: Daylight
content: or Daylight wins over, unlike the tabletop rules. Unlike the tabletop version, this is considered "sunlight" and will hurt Cazador and Vampire Spawns by dealing 20 radiant damage per turn. Astarion is completely unaffected by this due to the tadpole allowing him to walk in the sun completely unharmed.
